consentStep.title: We would like your permission to use your data for the following purposes.

personalization.label: Personalization & Ads:
personalization.description: Using your data to personalize your experience, including showing you relevant ads.

sharingData.label: Sharing your data:
sharingData.description: Sharing your data or zkTLS proofs related to such data with our data partners so they can deliver personalized ads, experiences and recommendations.

consentStep.withdrawalInfoPart1: You can withdraw your consent at any time by sending us an email at
consentStep.withdrawalInfoPart2: . Withdrawal will stop any future use of your data for these purposes, but it will not affect processing already carried out while your consent was active. Please refer to our
consentStep.withdrawalInfoPart3: to find out how we process and protect your data and how you can exercise your rights.

footer.byContinuing: By logging in you are accepting our

retryStep.pleaseTryAgain: You can retry or check your details and try again.
